parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add group to unit's [[High Command|high command]] bar.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>The previous HC leader should be [[hcRemoveGroup|removed]] before adding the new one (see '''[[#Examples|Example 3]]''').</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''hcSetGroup''' [group, groupName, team]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the leader

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> groupName: [[String]] - (Optional)

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> team: [[String]] - (Optional, default "teamMain") can be one of:
* "teamMain"
* "teamRed"
* "teamGreen"
* "teamBlue"
* "teamYellow"

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>unit [[hcSetGroup]] [group, "HQ", "teamred"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[hcSetGroup]] [group];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[player]] !<template><title>=</title></template> [[hcLeader]] _group) [[then]]
{
	[[hcLeader]] _group [[hcRemoveGroup]] _group;
	[[player]] [[hcSetGroup]] [_group];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]],[[hcAllGroups]],[[hcGroupParams]],[[hcLeader]],[[hcRemoveAllGroups]],[[hcRemoveGroup]],[[hcSelected]],[[hcSelectGroup]],[[hcShowBar]],[[hcShownBar]],[[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
